Capture.description: Captures all of the screen and stores it in `name`.

Capture at.description: Captures part of the screen and stores it in `name`.

Set.description: Sets a variable to a value.

Get.description: Gets the value from a collection at the `index` and stores it in `name`.

Load.description: Load a file from the path into the variable.

Save.description: Saves a variable to the disk.

Delete.description: Deletes the variable with the name.

Delete at.description: Deletes the file or directory at `path`.

Crop.description: Crops the image in `name` to the x y width height.

Find.description: Finds the best match of `template` within `image` equal to or above the default threshold.

Find with.description: Finds the best match of `template` within `image` equal to or above the given threshold.

Find all.description: Finds all possible matches equal to or above the default threshold.

Find all with.description: Finds all possible matches equal to or above the given threshold.

Find text.description: Finds the best match of text `template` within `image` equal to or above the default threshold.

Find text with.description: Finds the best match of text `template` within `image` equal to or above the given threshold.

Find all text.description: Finds all possible text matches equal to or above the default threshold.

body: Find all text ${1|block,paragraph,symbol,line,word|} ${2:var} by ${3:template} in ${4:image} with ${5:threshold}.
Find all text with.description: Finds all possible text matches equal to or above the given threshold.

Read.description: Reads all of the text in `image`.

Wait.description: Pauses for the given amount of time.

Countdown.description: Pauses for the given amount of time, and shows the time left in real time.

Pause.description: Pauses until the user hits a key.

Print.description: Prints the text or variable to the console.

Print with foreground color.description: Prints the text or variable to the console.

Print with foreground and background col.description: Prints the text or variable to the console.

Show.description: Shows the text or variable, and pauses for input.

Prompt input.description: Reads input from the user with an inline prompt.

Move mouse to position.description: Sets the mouse to the position.

Move mouse to match.description: Sets the mouse to the match position.

Move mouse by.description: Moves the mouse relative to its current position.

Press mouse.description: Sends a mouse button press event to the OS.

Release mouse.description: Sends a mouse button release event to the OS.

Click mouse.description: Sends a mouse button release event to the OS.

Click mouse X times.description: Sends multiple mouse down and mouse up event to the OS.

Scroll mouse.description: Sends a mouse scroll event to the OS.

Scroll mouse xy.description: Sends a mouse scroll event to the OS.

Press key.description: Sends a key down event to the OS.

Release key.description: Sends a key up event to the OS.

Type.description: Sends a series of key up/downs of the phrase or variable to the OS with no delay.

Type key.description: Sends a key up/downs of the phrase or variable to the OS.

Type with delay.description: Sends a series of key up/downs of the phrase or variable to the OS. `delay` is the wait time between each character.

Label.description: Creates a label that can be gone to with a goto statement.

Goto if.description: Goes to the label only if the `condition` is true.

Record.description: Records keyboard and mouse actions taken to a file at the given path.

Run.description: Runs a script from a string, path, or variable.

Configure.description: Sets a setting to a specified value.

Test.description: Runs a test and records the results.
